The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.

chromatography during the 8 h total reaction time.The output of methane was within the detection limits of the gas chromatography system (200 ppb).Thus, we adopted the CH 4 production per hour as a direct measure of activity toward CO 2 photocatalytic reduction with UV light (3.25 mW cm -2 ) at room temperature and ambient pressure.
